original_title: Ambisexuality: Seeing More Colour in the Rainbow
overview: While awareness and inclusion around sexual orientation have been increasing, there is one expression that is virtually unknown: ambisexuality. This film provides a penetrating insight into a hidden non-binary sexual orientation. Based on over 10 years of PhD and further research, it brings to life the personal journeys of three men based on their attraction to non-operative trans women. The film presents a compelling case that this sexual orientation has existed throughout history and across all cultures, but has 'flown under the radarâ€™ in modern society.
title: Ambisexuality: Seeing More Colour in the Rainbow
